results.title: Ponyo
results.creator_credit: Nippon Television Network Corporation, Toho Co. and Lawson
results.brief_description: The son of a sailor, 5-year old Sosuke lives a quiet life on an oceanside cliff with his mother Lisa. One fateful day, he finds a beautiful goldfish trapped in a bottle on the beach and upon rescuing her, names her Ponyo. But she is no ordinary goldfish.

constellations_other.name: The Pitch
constellations_other.description: Explore fantastical worlds and underwater seascapes.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Nippon Television Network Corporation, Toho Co. and Lawson
results.description: The son of a sailor, 5-year old Sosuke, lives a quiet life on an oceanside cliff with his mother Lisa. One fateful day, he finds a beautiful goldfish trapped in a bottle on the beach and upon rescuing her, names her Ponyo. But she is no ordinary goldfish.

results.title: Poltergeist
results.brief_description: One of the most famous horror movies of all time follows a family trying to deal with their haunted house by calling in parapsychologists. It’s also considered a cursed film because of tragedies associated with its production.

constellations_other.name: Dragon's Lair
constellations_other.description: A look at pop-cultural interconnections that spawn from the lair of Don Bluth's arcade classic.

results.description: Steve Freeling lives with his wife, Diane, and their three children, Dana, Robbie, and Carol Anne, in Southern California where he sells houses for the company that built the neighborhood. It starts with just a few odd occurrences, such as broken dishes and furniture moving around by itself. However, when he realizes that something truly evil haunts his home, Steve calls in a team of parapsychologists led by Dr. Lesh to help before it’s too late.
description_for_label: Steve Freeling lives with his wife, Diane, and their three children, Dana, Robbie, and Carol Anne, in Southern California where he sells houses for the company that built the neighborhood. It starts with just a few odd occurrences, such as broken dishes and furniture moving around by itself. However, when he realizes that something truly evil haunts his home, Steve calls in a team of parapsychologists led by Dr. Lesh to help before it’s too late.

results.title: PlayTime
results.creator_credit: Bernard Maurice, Art Buchwald, Jacques Cottin, Jacques Lagrange and Jacques Tati
results.brief_description: He attempts to meet with a business contact but soon becomes lost.

constellations_other.name: Sounds unreal
constellations_other.description: A history of syncing sound effects, a craft known as Foley in the USA and bootstepping in the UK.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Bernard Maurice, Art Buchwald, Jacques Cottin, Jacques Lagrange and Jacques Tati
results.description: Clumsy Monsieur Hulot finds himself perplexed by the intimidating complexity of a gadget-filled Paris. He attempts to meet with a business contact but soon becomes lost. His roundabout journey parallels that of an American tourist, and as they weave through the inventive urban environment, they intermittently meet, developing an interest in one another. They eventually get together at a chaotic restaurant, along with several other quirky characters.
description_for_label: Clumsy Monsieur Hulot finds himself perplexed by the intimidating complexity of a gadget-filled Paris. He attempts to meet with a business contact but soon becomes lost. His roundabout journey parallels that of an American tourist, and as they weave through the inventive urban environment, they intermittently meet, developing an interest in one another. They eventually get together at a chaotic restaurant, along with several other quirky characters.

results.title: Play School
results.brief_description: Play School is an Australian Gold Logie award-winning educational television show for children. It is the longest-running children’s show in Australia, and the second longest-running children’s show in the world.

constellations_other.name: Learning through play
constellations_other.description: Alexander Stitt and Bruce Weatherhead’s Zoetrope to Cinemascope educated children about the moving image through posters, cut-outs, puzzles and games, but moving image works have also been used to educate and entertain kids about all aspects of life.

constellations_other.name: Taking it slow
constellations_other.description: Daniel Crooks' Phantom Ride offers a meditative journey through digital landscapes that make the viewer pause and reflect.

results.description:
Play School is an Australian Gold Logie award winning educational television show for children produced by the Australian Broadcasting Corporation and then Southern Star Entertainment in 2014. It is the longest-running children’s show in Australia, and the second longest running children’s show in the world.

In 2016, Play School celebrated 50 years on the air. An estimated 80% of pre-school children under six watch the programme at least once a week.

It is screened twice every weekday afternoon at 3:05 pm on ABC1 every day 9:30 am and weekday 4:30 pm on ABC2’s ABC4 Kids.
description_for_label:
Play School is an Australian Gold Logie award winning educational television show for children produced by the Australian Broadcasting Corporation and then Southern Star Entertainment in 2014. It is the longest-running children’s show in Australia, and the second longest running children’s show in the world.

It is screened twice every weekday afternoon at 3:05 pm on ABC1 every day 9:30 am and weekday 4:30 pm on ABC2’s ABC4 Kids.

results.title: Picnic at Hanging Rock
results.brief_description: Valentine’s Day, 1900. Three schoolgirls and their governess mysteriously disappear in Hanging Rock, Australia, without a trace.

constellations_other.name: Clothing, country, character
constellations_other.description: Edie Kurzer's costume design work on Judy & Punch and Picnic at Hanging Rock is part of a larger trend in Australian films and TV series.

constellations_other.name: Inspired design and costume sketches
constellations_other.description: Costume designers Edie Kurzer and Alice Babidge have worked on some of the most acclaimed Australian and international films and TV, joining the ranks of fellow Australians creatives.

results.description: Valentine’s Day, 1900. Three schoolgirls and their governess mysteriously disappear in Hanging Rock, Australia, without a trace.
description_for_label: Valentine’s Day, 1900. Three schoolgirls and their governess mysteriously disappear in Hanging Rock, Australia, without a trace.

results.title: Phoenix
results.brief_description: A disfigured concentration-camp survivor, unrecognizable after facial reconstruction surgery, searches ravaged postwar Berlin for the husband who might have betrayed her to the Nazis.

constellations_other.name: Reflecting duality and revealing new realities
constellations_other.description: The Toupie Fantoche relies on four prismatic mirrors to reflect changes in animation states.

results.description: A disfigured concentration-camp survivor, unrecognizable after facial reconstruction surgery, searches ravaged postwar Berlin for the husband who might have betrayed her to the Nazis.
description_for_label: A disfigured concentration-camp survivor, unrecognizable after facial reconstruction surgery, searches ravaged postwar Berlin for the husband who might have betrayed her to the Nazis.

results.title: Penny Dreadful
results.brief_description: Some of literature’s most terrifying characters, including Dr. Frankenstein, Dorian Gray, and iconic figures from the novel Dracula are lurking in the darkest corners of Victorian London. Penny Dreadful is a frightening psychological thriller that weaves together these classic horror origin stories into a new adult drama.

constellations_other.name: The Lumière brothers
constellations_other.description: The Lumière brothers understood the potential of cinema to be exhibited theatrically. Only one person could watch films through Thomas Edison's Kinetograph, while Auguste and Louis exhibited their films to thousands with Cinematographe.

results.description: Some of literature’s most terrifying characters, including Dr. Frankenstein, Dorian Gray, and iconic figures from the novel Dracula are lurking in the darkest corners of Victorian London. Penny Dreadful is a frightening psychological thriller that weaves together these classic horror origin stories into a new adult drama.

results.title: Pearl Harbor
results.creator_credit: Jerry Bruckheimer Films, Touchstone Pictures, Michael Kaplan, Michael Bay, Jerry Bruckheimer, Pat Sandston, Randall Wallace, Nigel Phelps, K.C. Hodenfield, Kenny Bates, Mitzi Haralson and Jennifer Klein
results.brief_description: The lifelong friendship between Rafe McCawley and Danny Walker is put to the ultimate test when the two ace fighter pilots become entangled in a love triangle with beautiful Naval nurse Evelyn Johnson. But the rivalry between the friends-turned-foes is immediately put on hold when they find themselves at the center of Japan’s devastating attack on Pearl Harbor on Dec. 7, 1941.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jerry Bruckheimer Films, Touchstone Pictures, Michael Kaplan, Michael Bay, Jerry Bruckheimer, Pat Sandston, Randall Wallace, Nigel Phelps, K.C. Hodenfield, Kenny Bates, Mitzi Haralson and Jennifer Klein

But the rivalry between the friends-turned-foes is immediately put on hold when they find themselves at the center of Japan’s devastating attack on Pearl Harbor on Dec. 7, 1941.

results.title: Paris, Texas
results.headline_credit: France, Germany, United Kingdom and United States of America, 1984
results.brief_description: Travis Henderson (Harry Dean Stanton) wanders out of the desert not knowing who he is in Wim Wenders’ Palme d’Or-winning film. Henderson’s brother, Walt (Dean Stockwell) finds him, and helps to recover the memory of the life Travis led before he walked out on his family and disappeared four years earlier.

constellations_other.name: When music speaks
constellations_other.description: Some characters or moments are expressed more intensely through a musical motif than dialogue or action.

results.headline_credit_for_label: France, Germany, United Kingdom and United States of America, 1984
results.description: A man wanders out of the desert not knowing who he is. His brother finds him, and helps to pull his memory back of the life he led before he walked out on his family and disappeared four years earlier.
description_for_label: A man wanders out of the desert not knowing who he is. His brother finds him, and helps to pull his memory back of the life he led before he walked out on his family and disappeared four years earlier.

video_links.name: PARIS, TEXAS Trailer (1984) - The Criterion Collection

results.title: Paris Is Burning
results.brief_description: Where does voguing come from, and what, exactly, is throwing shade? This landmark documentary provides a vibrant snapshot of the 1980s through the eyes of New York City’s African American and Latinx Harlem drag-ball scene. Made over seven years, PARIS IS BURNING offers an intimate portrait of rival fashion “houses,” from fierce contests for trophies to house mothers offering sustenance in a world rampant with homophobia, transphobia, racism, AIDS, and poverty. Featuring legendary voguers, drag queens, and trans women — including Willi Ninja, Pepper LaBeija, Dorian Corey, and Venus Xtravaganza.
